participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and outgoing, enjoys both social activities and solitary hobbies.
participant_1.background: I enjoy playing Magic: the Gathering in my free time. I'm going to the park with my pug, Corky. I am not sure if my co-worker likes me, but I have a dog named Max. I drive a Subaru Outback because it is roomy for my quilting supplies and my mountain bike. I take pride in my appearance.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and passionate about music and relationships, values family time.
participant_2.background: I have a hidden stash of romance novels that my parents would disapprove of. I'm really excited to focus on my family and partner now that I've quit my job. I listen to rock music. I listen to folk music. I spend my days driving around Los Angeles in my foreign car looking for dates.

content.text: Hi there, what is your name?
Hi, nice to meet you! My name is participant_2.
It is nice to meet you too participant_1. What do you do for a living?
I just quit my job and I am really excited to focus on my family and partner.
That is great! What kind of work did you do?
I was in a band, but I decided to retire so I can spend more time with my family.
That is really cool! What kind of music did you play?
We played rock music.
That is awesome. I love listening to rock music.
Thanks! What do you do for fun?
I like to play Magic: the Gathering, quilt, and go for walks with my dog.
That sounds fun! I like to read romance novels, listen to folk music, and drive around Los Angeles looking for dates.
That is also sounds fun! I have never been to Los Angeles before, but it looks like a beautiful city.
It is a great city! I love living here.
I am glad to hear that! Where are you from originally?
I am from a small town in the Midwest, but I have been living in Los Angeles for the past 10 years.
That is cool! I have always wanted to live in a big city.
It is definitely an experience! I love the energy and excitement of living in a big city.
I can imagine! I am sure it is a lot different than living in a small town.
It definitely is! But I love it here.
I am glad to hear that
